description: We support the victims in dealing with and working through their traumatic experience. We transparently point out ways how to react in a healthy and healing way to what has happened and accompany / assist the clients in going them.

Victim support organisation that is active nationwide, the victim helpline is available daily between 7 a.m. and 10 p.m. They know which services can be obtained through other service providers and can point out the way to find the right ones.
services: Assistance in dealing with legal paperwork

description: An umbrella organisation for a range of professional victim support organisations operating at the regional level.

fullName: Association of Counseling Centers for Victims of Right-Wing, Racist and Antisemitic Violence in Germany
description: VBRG is committed to providing victims of right-wing, racist and antisemitic violence across Germany with access to counselling and support.

fullName: Bundesverband Frauenberatungsstellen und Frauennotrufe - Frauen Gegen Gewalt e.V.
description: The bff is the federal association of rape crisis centres and women’s counselling centres in Germany.

shortName: Frauen- und Kinderschutzhaus Kreis Waldshut e.V.
fullName: Frauen- und Kinderschutzhaus Kreis Waldshut e.V.
description: Women's Counseling Center COURAGE - specialized counseling center for women and girls in cases of domestic and sexual violence.

The Foundation grants financial assistance to persons who have been victims of a crime. Benefits may also be granted to close relatives (spouse, partner, children, parents) if they have suffered particular disadvantages as a result of the crime.
We support you in dealing with overwhelming feelings and in restoring security and self-confidence. We inform you about possible psychological consequences.
services: Victim Protection: Sexual Abuse of Children

description: Online counseling for problems and anxieties resulting from an experienced crime Support in processing traumatic experiences.If necessary, help in contacting lawyers, therapists, and other help institutions.

The TRAUMA- UND OPFERZENTRUM FRANKFURT e.V. is a professional counseling center for women and men, girls and boys. No matter whether they were insulted, assaulted, injured, abused or raped. We will advise and support you free of charge, strictly confidentially and anonymously if you wish - regardless of whether you have filed a complaint or want to file a complaint
services: Assistance in dealing with legal paperwork

fullName: AWO Via - Wege aus der Gewalt (Beratungsstelle für Männer)
description: Via - Wege aus der Gewalt is a counseling and clearing center for domestic violence, sexual violence such as rape and sexual abuse, psychological and physical violence, and stalking.
services: Psychological Support during and after Reporting

description: Collection of different kind of victim-help resources
services: Collection of different kind of victim-help resources

description: The main purpose of the Foundation is to provide supplementary financial assistance to victims of crime. The foundation is intended to close gaps in the current statutory compensation system.
Counseling and help for women via telephone counseling in 18 foreign languages.
